body:
$! Get information about VAT, including how to pay and penalties for mistakes and delays when you pay.$!

$C
**VAT Helpline**      
Telephone: 0845 010 9000   
Textphone: 0845 000 0200   
From outside the UK: +44 (0)2920 501 261   
Monday to Friday, 8am to 6pm  
[Find out about call charges](/call-charges)
$C

Get information about:

- [how to pay VAT](/send-vat-return)
- [sign up to use VAT online services](/vat-registration/overview)
creator: Liz Lutgendorff
overview: Get information about VAT, including how to pay and penalties for mistakes and delays when paying
title: VAT Helpline
